DOC.brief_summary: This is a descriptive study to determine the role of fetal GBS disease as a cause for stillbirths
DOC.brief_title: Group B Streptococcus (GBS) Associated Stillbirths in a High Burden Setting
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective, descriptive study will be undertaken involving mothers who have a stillbirth at Chris Hani Baragwanath Academic Hospital (CHBAH), a secondary-tertiary care hospital, from 2014 up until 2016.
DOC.criteria: Pregnant women delivering a stillbirth at CHBAH Participants aged â‰¥18 years Able to understand and comply with planned study procedures Provides written informed consent (either generic ICF or V98_28OBTP) Refuses to consent to study participation
